ygData.subject: Re: [eqbards] [egbarts] OT: Changing computers
ygData.msgSnippet: Yep, thats what I m going to try.  The second person to reply to my post suggested that :-)  Thanks to all who made suggestions...  I was kind of trying to
ygData.messageBody:
Yep, thats what I'm going to try. The second person to reply to my post
suggested that :-) Thanks to all who made suggestions... I was kind of
trying to Kabong the thread with that post... (I forget that I am
reading old posts when i get to work on Monday morning, since I dont get
these on the weekend)

> From: Gary Johnston <garyj@...>
>
> Can't you just copy them :)
> They are the .opt files in the EQ directory.
> I seem to remember doing that before when I switched hard drives.
> I just copied the whole thing across though but the opt files are the ones
> you need I think.

--
We now return to the non-stop rock.

Matt DeBarger
